description: Add flavour and flair to your dishes with this easy homemade seasoning. Sprinkle this seaweed and sesame salt over steamed rice, ramen or grilled salmon.
keywords: Sauce & condiment,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Egg free,Low sugar,Quick & easy,Dec 2021,Halal,Christmas,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan
name: Seaweed & Sesame Salt Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 sheet toasted nori, torn into 5cm pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Place nori and salt in a small food processor and process until combined and salt is crushed slightly. Add sesame seeds and process until combined. Transfer to a sterilised jar.
